extension.name: SCSocial Find Us
extension.author: SourceCoast | www.sourcecoast.com
extension.description: This is the Social Find Us module that goes with the JFBConnect component, which lets users share their social network pages.

field.name: orientation
field.label: Orientation
field.description: Determines whether the buttons are vertically or horizontally oriented

field.name: position
field.label: Position
field.description: Choose whether the buttons show as a standard fixed module or float to the side/top of the screen

field.name: margin
field.label: Margin
field.description: Set the margin around the entire set of buttons

field.name: padding
field.label: Padding
field.description: Set the padding around the entire set of buttons

field.name: float_position_top
field.label: Float Position from Top
field.description: Set the position from top in px when 'Float' Position is set. Using a number greater than 3000 will float to the bottom of the screen

field.name: float_position_left
field.label: Float Position from Left
field.description: Set the position from the left in px when 'Float' Position is set. Using a number greater than 3000 will float to the right of the screen

field.name: facebook_url
field.label: Facebook URL
field.description: Your Facebook profile or page link.

field.name: linkedin_url
field.label: LinkedIn URL
field.description: Your LinkedIn profile, company or school page url.

field.name: google_url
field.label: Google+ URL
field.description: Your Google+ profile or page url.

field.name: twitter_url
field.label: Twitter URL
field.description: Your Twitter profile or stream url.

field.name: pinterest_url
field.label: Pinterest URL
field.description: Your Pinterest profile or stream url.

field.name: user_intro
field.label: Intro Text
field.description: This is the text or HTML that is displayed above the social content.
